Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.TemplateConfiguration

  • Packages that use TemplateConfiguration 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver
    Template lookup, loading, and caching: Base classes/interfaces

    • Uses of TemplateConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type TemplateConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object CustomAttribute.get(TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
      Same as CustomAttribute.get(Template), but applies to a TemplateConfiguration.
      void TemplateConfiguration.merge(TemplateConfiguration tc)
      Set all settings in this TemplateConfiguration that were set in the parameter TemplateConfiguration, possibly overwriting the earlier value in this object.
      void CustomAttribute.set(Object value, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
      Same as CustomAttribute.set(Object, Template), but applicable to a TemplateConfiguration.

    • Uses of TemplateConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver that return TemplateConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract TemplateConfiguration TemplateConfigurationFactory.get(String sourceName, TemplateLoadingSource templateLoadingSource)
      Returns (maybe creates) the TemplateConfiguration for the given template source.
      TemplateConfiguration MergingTemplateConfigurationFactory.get(String sourceName, TemplateLoadingSource templateLoadingSource) 
      TemplateConfiguration FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory.get(String sourceName, TemplateLoadingSource templateLoadingSource) 
      TemplateConfiguration ConditionalTemplateConfigurationFactory.get(String sourceName, TemplateLoadingSource templateLoadingSource) 
      TemplateConfiguration TemplateLoadingResult.getTemplateConfiguration()
      If TemplateLoadingResult.getStatus() is TemplateLoadingResultStatus.OPENED, and the template loader stores such information (which is rare) then it returns the TemplateConfiguration applicable to the template, otherwise it returns null.
      Constructors in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver with parameters of type TemplateConfiguration 
      Constructor and Description
      ConditionalTemplateConfigurationFactory(TemplateSourceMatcher matcher, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration) 
      TemplateLoadingResult(TemplateLoadingSource source, Serializable version, InputStream inputStream, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
      Creates an instance with status TemplateLoadingResultStatus.OPENED, for a storage mechanism that naturally returns the template content as sequence of byte-s as opposed to a sequence of char-s.
      TemplateLoadingResult(TemplateLoadingSource source, Serializable version, Reader reader, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
      Creates an instance with status TemplateLoadingResultStatus.OPENED, for a storage mechanism that naturally returns the template content as sequence of char-s as opposed to a sequence of byte-s.
